about_the_game:
The artwork we received from Rusimitu

Treasure of Cutuma 3rd -Dawn of Cutuma-
Video distributor "Cutuma 3rd"s fan game.
It is considered that people who do not know Cutuma 3rd can enjoy it.

About Cutuma 3rd


He is a Japanese video distributor who discovers and distributes funny elements of Indie games.

Story


One day, Ran Kawasaki learns about a hidden treasure in the Republic of Cutuma.
There is a hidden treasure hidden by Cutuma III, who ruled the ancient Cutuma Empire.
Ran flew to the Republic of Cutuma on the advice of her guide.

About game


TPS game. The player's weapon is a rifle.
(The number of bullets is infinite. Each shot requires a reload.)
The goal is to liberate all the villages and get 5 treasure cards.
The area is 1 kilometer square.
Original music composition.
Including metafictional remarks. If you are familiar with indie games, you can enjoy it more.
If you like junk games, you can enjoy it more.
If you are a fan of "Cutuma 3rd", you can enjoy it more.
Since the famous junk games in Japan and other countries are different, they are translated considering the difference.

What is a free asset?


Game materials that are freely available to independent game developers.
It is so-called the free materials.

Indicator


Controls


W, A, S, D: Move.
Spacebar: jump. You can jump 4 times.
Dash: Shift key.
Reload technique: While running, release the Shift key only for a moment, press R, and then press Shift again.
ESC: Pause screen.
E: Draw(or put into holster) the rifle.
Right Click: Aim target with rifle.
Left click: Shoot a rifle if you're aiming at a target. Read the texts.
Interact: get closer to what you interact with.
F: Turn on the flashlight.
G: Turn off the flashlight.
TAB: Displays the treasure cards that you own.

When Ran is on an airplane


W, S: Speed increase/decrease.
Mouse, A, D: Control. (up and down inverted)
Left click: Shoot a machine gun. (Infinite number of bullets)
C: Switch camera

highlighted.name: Welcome to the Republic of Cutuma.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes the expression of firing weapons and firearms at people.
The game includes swearing and vulgar language.
It does not include blood or Gore representations.

detailed_description:
Options Notes

Checked that the screen flickers when SHADOW PROJECTION is not set to STABLE FIT.

name: Treasure of Cutuma 3rd

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT, Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4.7 GB of storage space is required to install the base game and all DLC games.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (7th) or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4.7 GB of storage space is required to install the base game and all DLC games.

short_description: A simple TPS game. Video distributor "Cutuma 3rd"s fan game. Get all the 5 treasure cards. Visit the fascinating sights of the Cutuma Tower, Gamegulland, etc in the Cutuma Republic.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese
